Room.Name: Hillborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hillborough Way, south of Danielle's Mage Emporium.
Room.LongDescription: Danielle Chanteclaire is one of the only living archmages in all of Oceancrest. Not many people ever reach the status of archmage, and, in fact, there have only been ten archmages in all of history. Only two are living today, which is quite amazing in itself. Ironically, most of the archmages are still "alive" in the form of liches.
